00019 PlayPlayer::PlayPlayer(PlayModeManager* playManager, std::string name, std::string model) : Player(playManager, name, model)
00020 {
00021     m_curWeapon = m_weaponsPack.end();
00022     m_killed = false;
00023     m_bullettimeActive = false;
00024     m_bullettime = 100;
00025     m_boostAvalaible = true;

00030     m_deadExplode = new ParticlesEmiter;

00033     m_deadExplode->SetLifeDown(0.075);

00036     m_deadExplode->SetAutoRebuild(false);
00037

00039

00042     WeaponBlaster* blaster = new WeaponBlaster(m_playManager);
00043     AddWeapon("blaster", blaster);
00044 }

00046 PlayPlayer::~PlayPlayer()
00047 {
00048     m_playManager->GetParticlesScene()->DeleteParticlesEmiter(m_deadExplode);
00049 
00050     for(Weapon::Map::iterator i = m_weaponsPack.begin(); i != m_weaponsPack.end(); i++)
00051         delete i->second;
00052 }

00054 void PlayPlayer::SetKilled()
00055 {
00056     m_killed = true;
00057     m_life = 0;
00058 
00059     m_deadExplode->SetEnable(true);
00060     m_deadExplode->SetDeadEmiter(false);
00061     m_deadExplode->SetPos(m_matrix.GetPos());
00062     m_deadExplode->Build();
00063 
00064     m_playManager->GetMaterialManager()->SetGhost(this, true);
00065 
00066     clocks.readyToDelete.SnapShoot();
00067 
00068     SetFreeze(true);
00069     SetEnable(false);
00070 
00071     m_soundManager->Play("kill", this);
00072 }

00080 void PlayPlayer::ReBorn()
00081 {
00082     m_life = 100;
00083     m_killed = false;
00084 
00085     m_bullettime = 100;
00086     m_bullettimeActive = false;
00087 
00088     m_boostAvalaible = true;

00097

00100     WeaponBlaster* blaster = new WeaponBlaster(m_playManager);
00101     AddWeapon("blaster", blaster);
00102 
00103     SetRandomPosInTheFloor();
00104 }
00105 
00106 void PlayPlayer::Process()
00107 {
00108     // Bullettime --------------------------------------------------------------
00109 
00110     if(m_bullettimeActive)
00111     {
00112         if(m_bullettime > 0)
00113             m_bullettime--;
00114 
00115         else if(m_bullettime == 0)
00116             SetBullettimeMotion(false);
00117 
00118     }
00119 
00120     else
00121     {
00122         if(m_bullettime < 100)
00123             m_bullettime++;
00124     }
00125 
00126     // Boost -------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 
00128     if(!m_boostAvalaible)
00129     {
00130         if(clocks.boostAvailable.IsEsplanedTime(3000))
00131         {
00132             m_boostAvalaible = true;
00133 
00134             if(m_playManager->GetAppManager()->globalSettings.video.usePpe)
00135                 m_playManager->ppe.boost->SetEnable(false);
00136         }
00137     }
00138 }
00139 
00140 void PlayPlayer::Shoot(Vector3f targetpos)
00141 {
00142     m_curWeapon->second->Shoot(m_matrix.GetPos() + (targetpos - m_matrix.GetPos()).Normalize() * 1.5f, targetpos);
00143 }

00145 void PlayPlayer::Jump()
00146 {
00147     if(!m_body)
00148         return;
00149 
00150     NewtonBodyAddImpulse(m_body, Vector3f(0, 30, 0), m_matrix.GetPos());
00151 }
00152 
00153 void PlayPlayer::Boost()
00154 {
00155     if(!m_body || m_applyForce == 0.0f)
00156         return;
00157 
00158     if(m_boostAvalaible)
00159     {
00160         m_boostAvalaible = false;
00161 
00162         Vector3f impulseDeri = Vector3f::Normalize(m_applyForce) * PLAYER_BOOSTSPEED;
00163         impulseDeri.y = 0;
00164 
00165         NewtonBodyAddImpulse(m_body, impulseDeri, m_matrix.GetPos());
00166 
00167         m_soundManager->Play("boost", this);
00168 
00169         clocks.boostAvailableSound.SnapShoot();
00170         clocks.boostAvailable.SnapShoot();
00171 
00172         if(m_playManager->GetAppManager()->globalSettings.video.usePpe)
00173         {
00174             clocks.boostDisableBlur.SnapShoot();
00175             m_playManager->ppe.boost->SetEnable(true);
00176         }
00177     }
00178 
00179     else if(clocks.boostAvailableSound.IsEsplanedTime(800))
00180     {
00181         m_playManager->GetSoundManager()->Play("noAvailable", this);
00182     }
00183 }

00185 void PlayPlayer::AddWeapon(std::string name, Weapon* weapon)
00186 {
00187     if(m_weaponsPack.find(name) != m_weaponsPack.end())
00188     {
00189         m_weaponsPack[name]->UpAmmoCount(weapon->GetAmmoCount());
00190         delete weapon;
00191     }
00192 
00193     else
00194     {
00195         m_weaponsPack[name] = weapon;
00196     }
00197 
00198     m_curWeapon = m_weaponsPack.find(name);
00199     m_curWeapon->second->SetShooter(this);
00200 }

00202 void PlayPlayer::SwitchUpWeapon()
00203 {
00204     m_curWeapon->second->RestoreShootCadency();
00205 
00206     m_curWeapon++;
00207 
00208     if(m_curWeapon == m_weaponsPack.end())
00209         m_curWeapon = m_weaponsPack.begin();
00210 
00211     m_curWeapon->second->SetBullttimeMotion(m_bullettimeActive);
00212 }
00213 
00214 void PlayPlayer::SwitchDownWeapon()
00215 {
00216     m_curWeapon->second->RestoreShootCadency();
00217 
00218     if(m_curWeapon == m_weaponsPack.begin())
00219         m_curWeapon = m_weaponsPack.end();
00220 
00221     m_curWeapon--;
00222 
00223     m_curWeapon->second->SetBullttimeMotion(m_bullettimeActive);
00224 }

00226 void PlayPlayer::SetCurWeapon(std::string weaponName)
00227 {
00228     m_curWeapon = m_weaponsPack.find(weaponName);
00229 
00230     if(m_curWeapon == m_weaponsPack.end())
00231         throw tbe::Exception("PlayPlayer::SetCurWeapon\nWeapon not found (%s)\n\n", weaponName.c_str());
00232 }

00316 void PlayPlayer::TakeDammage(Ammo* ammo)
00317 {
00318     Weapon* strikerWeapon = ammo->GetParent();
00319     PlayPlayer* striker = strikerWeapon->GetShooter();
00320 
00321     // Assignation dommage
00322     m_life -= strikerWeapon->GetMaxAmmoDammage();
00323 
00324     striker->UpScore();
00325 
00326     // Mise a jour score
00327     if(m_life <= 0)
00328     {
00329         m_life = 0;
00330 
00331         striker->UpScore(10);
00332     }
00333 
00334     // Son
00335     m_soundManager->Play("hit", this);
00336 }
